General.Name: P-Two Industries
General.Description: P-Two Industries Inc. manufactures and sells computer related components, communication equipment, and precision terminals and connectors in Taiwan. The company offers flex flat cable (FFC), floating board to board, FFC/flexible printed circuit (FPC) connector, power WTB, USB type C, WTB, SATA connector, and LVDS socket connector products. Its products are used in automotive, computer and peripherals, visual displays, and consumer electronics industries. The company was founded in 1986 and is headquartered in Táoyuán, Taiwan.
General.Address: No. 9, Shin Hwa Road, Táoyuán, Taiwan, 330
